review: This product wasn't us full to me, I tried streaming movies from my phone to my television and it was constantly lagging. I might be good for other things but for what I wanted it for, it was horrible.
author: Henry

review: I really enjoy this for watching YouTube on my large HD/LCD TV.
author: Michael S. Branigan

review: Bought this for my dad and he loves it! Uses it for streaming all sorts of things on his TV directly from his phone.
author: Dustin Durbin

review: Not that good quality. it is getting pieces and on the browser I am having difficulties to keep the connectivity
author: EK "SFO"

review: Worked good for about a week the the second week it would freeze from time to time then on the third week it doesnt work at all so upset i wasted my money on this
author: MalcolmX

review: used it a lot. good for watching YouTube content in big screens. but, sometimes it keeps searching for signals.
author: James

review: Great for someone that loves Netflix and not a lot of TV
author: Shannn White
